Yii Framework v2.0.0-dev Class Reference

Abstract Class yii\db\Schema

All Classes | Properties | Methods | Constants
Inheritanceyii\db\Schema » yii\base\Object
Implementsyii\base\Arrayable
Subclassesyii\db\cubrid\Schema, yii\db\mssql\Schema, yii\db\mysql\Schema, yii\db\oci\Schema, yii\db\pgsql\Schema, yii\db\sqlite\Schema
Available since version2.0
Source Code
Schema is the base class for concrete DBMS-specific schema classes.

Schema represents the database schema information that is DBMS specific.

Public Properties

Hide inherited properties

PropertyTypeDescriptionDefined By
$db yii\db\Connection The database connection yii\db\Schema
$defaultSchema string The default schema name used for the current session yii\db\Schema
$tableSchemas yii\db\TableSchema[] the metadata for all tables in the database yii\db\Schema
$tableNames string all table names in the database yii\db\Schema
$queryBuilder yii\db\QueryBuilder the query builder for this connection yii\db\Schema
$lastInsertID string the row ID of the last row inserted, or the last value retrieved from the sequence object yii\db\Schema

Property Details

$db property
yii\db\Connection $db = null

The database connection

$defaultSchema property
string $defaultSchema = null

The default schema name used for the current session.

$tableSchemas property read-only
yii\db\TableSchema[] getTableSchemas( $schema = '', $refresh = false )

the metadata for all tables in the database. Each array element is an instance of yii\db\TableSchema or its child class.

$tableNames property read-only
string getTableNames( $schema = '', $refresh = false )

all table names in the database.

$queryBuilder property read-only
yii\db\QueryBuilder getQueryBuilder( )

the query builder for this connection.

$lastInsertID property read-only
string getLastInsertID( $sequenceName = '' )

the row ID of the last row inserted, or the last value retrieved from the sequence object

Method Details

loadTableSchema() method
yii\db\TableSchema loadTableSchema( $name )
$name string Table name
return yii\db\TableSchema DBMS-dependent table metadata, null if the table does not exist.

Loads the metadata for the specified table.

getTableSchema() method
yii\db\TableSchema getTableSchema( $name, $refresh = false )
$name string Table name. The table name may contain schema name if any. Do not quote the table name.
$refresh boolean Whether to reload the table schema even if it is found in the cache.
return yii\db\TableSchema table metadata. Null if the named table does not exist.

Obtains the metadata for the named table.

getCacheKey() method
mixed getCacheKey( $name )
$name string The table name
return mixed the cache key

Returns the cache key for the specified table name.

getCacheGroup() method
string getCacheGroup( )
return string the cache group name

Returns the cache group name.

This allows refresh() to invalidate all cached table schemas.

getTableSchemas() method
yii\db\TableSchema[] getTableSchemas( $schema = '', $refresh = false )
$schema string The schema of the tables. Defaults to empty string, meaning the current or default schema name.
$refresh boolean Whether to fetch the latest available table schemas. If this is false, cached data may be returned if available.
return yii\db\TableSchema[] the metadata for all tables in the database. Each array element is an instance of yii\db\TableSchema or its child class.

Returns the metadata for all tables in the database.

getTableNames() method
string getTableNames( $schema = '', $refresh = false )
$schema string The schema of the tables. Defaults to empty string, meaning the current or default schema name. If not empty, the returned table names will be prefixed with the schema name.
$refresh boolean Whether to fetch the latest available table names. If this is false, table names fetched previously (if available) will be returned.
return string all table names in the database.

Returns all table names in the database.

getQueryBuilder() method
yii\db\QueryBuilder getQueryBuilder( )
return yii\db\QueryBuilder the query builder for this connection.

getPdoType() method
integer getPdoType( $data )
$data mixed The data whose PDO type is to be determined
return integer the PDO type

Determines the PDO type for the given PHP data value.

See Also

  • http://www.php.net/manual/en/pdo.constants.php
refresh() method
void refresh( )

Refreshes the schema.

This method cleans up all cached table schemas so that they can be re-created later to reflect the database schema change.

createQueryBuilder() method
yii\db\QueryBuilder createQueryBuilder( )
return yii\db\QueryBuilder query builder instance

Creates a query builder for the database.

This method may be overridden by child classes to create a DBMS-specific query builder.

findTableNames() method
array findTableNames( $schema = '' )
$schema string The schema of the tables. Defaults to empty string, meaning the current or default schema.
return array all table names in the database. The names have NO schema name prefix.
throws yii\base\NotSupportedException if this method is called

Returns all table names in the database.

This method should be overridden by child classes in order to support this feature because the default implementation simply throws an exception.

findUniqueIndexes() method
array findUniqueIndexes( $table )
$table yii\db\TableSchema The table metadata
return array all unique indexes for the given table.
throws yii\base\NotSupportedException if this method is called

Returns all unique indexes for the given table.

Each array element is of the following structure:

[
 'IndexName1' => ['col1' [, ...]],
 'IndexName2' => ['col2' [, ...]],
]

This method should be overridden by child classes in order to support this feature because the default implementation simply throws an exception

getLastInsertID() method
string getLastInsertID( $sequenceName = '' )
$sequenceName string Name of the sequence object (required by some DBMS)
return string the row ID of the last row inserted, or the last value retrieved from the sequence object
throws yii\base\InvalidCallException if the DB connection is not active

Returns the ID of the last inserted row or sequence value.

See Also

  • http://www.php.net/manual/en/function.PDO-lastInsertId.php
quoteValue() method
string quoteValue( $str )
$str string String to be quoted
return string the properly quoted string

Quotes a string value for use in a query.

Note that if the parameter is not a string, it will be returned without change.

See Also

  • http://www.php.net/manual/en/function.PDO-quote.php
quoteTableName() method
string quoteTableName( $name )
$name string Table name
return string the properly quoted table name

Quotes a table name for use in a query.

If the table name contains schema prefix, the prefix will also be properly quoted. If the table name is already quoted or contains '(' or '{{', then this method will do nothing.

See Also

  • quoteSimpleTableName()
quoteColumnName() method
string quoteColumnName( $name )
$name string Column name
return string the properly quoted column name

Quotes a column name for use in a query.

If the column name contains prefix, the prefix will also be properly quoted. If the column name is already quoted or contains '(', '[[' or '{{', then this method will do nothing.

See Also

  • quoteSimpleColumnName()
quoteSimpleTableName() method
string quoteSimpleTableName( $name )
$name string Table name
return string the properly quoted table name

Quotes a simple table name for use in a query.

A simple table name should contain the table name only without any schema prefix. If the table name is already quoted, this method will do nothing.

quoteSimpleColumnName() method
string quoteSimpleColumnName( $name )
$name string Column name
return string the properly quoted column name

Quotes a simple column name for use in a query.

A simple column name should contain the column name only without any prefix. If the column name is already quoted or is the asterisk character '*', this method will do nothing.

getRawTableName() method
string getRawTableName( $name )
$name string The table name to be converted
return string the real name of the given table name

Returns the actual name of a given table name.

This method will strip off curly brackets from the given table name and replace the percentage character '%' with yii\db\Connection::$tablePrefix.

getColumnPhpType() method
string getColumnPhpType( $column )
$column yii\db\ColumnSchema The column schema information
return string PHP type name

Extracts the PHP type from abstract DB type.
